TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {151949=Price quoted is applicable to vehicles first registered on or after 1st March 2013. Time and mileage restrictions apply. Please ask your dealer for full terms and conditions. Fixed Price Service Plan must be purchased before the vehicles first scheduled service. The Hyundai Fixed Price Service Plan (3 years/30,000 miles) covers the cost of the parts, lubricants and labour involved for the first 3 services. The Hyundai Fixed Price Service Plan (5 years/50,000 miles) covers the cost of the parts, lubricants and labour involved for the first 5 services. VAT at a rate of 20% is included in the purchase price. Servicing conducted under The Hyundai Fixed Price Service Plan must be carried out in line with Hyundai Motors UK’s time and mileage recommendations at any participating Hyundai Dealer or Hyundai Authorised Repairer within the UK. Service due dates are taken from the First Date of Registration of the vehicle., 157828=© Copyright 2007-2015 Hyundai Motor UK, 10794=All ix35 models are available while current stock lasts.
